value: '27 01 GOVERNOR PHILLIP TOWER' LEVEL 27 1 FARRER PLACE, SYDNEY, 2000, NSW, Australia

6722 - Management Investment Offices, Open-End Summary > PENGANA CAPITAL LTD is an Australian public company. Its operations cover management investment offices, open-end. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. PENGANA CAPITAL LTD is headquartered in Sydney, New South Wales. It is headed by chief executive officer Nicholas Charles Griffiths. For the 2025 financial year, the company reported revenue of $46.91 million. Its net profit totalled $4.68 million. PENGANA CAPITAL LTD forms part of the finance, insurance, and real estate industry sector.
